## GEOID conversion script

```{r}
# this is a function to convert IDS to string

stringcsv <- function(year) {
  dat <- read.csv(paste0("noncit", year))
  dat <- dat %>% 
    mutate(ID = paste(ID))
  write.csv(dat, paste0("noncit", year, "_updated"))
}
```
